samples.singleton

Class StaticService

  • java.lang.Object
    • samples.singleton.StaticService

  • public class StaticService
extends Object
    Test class to demonstrate static, static+final, static+native and static+final+native methods mocking.
    Author:
    Johan Haleby, Jan Kronquist
